value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Commander Anna! You're all right!$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Wait, who is this with you?$k$p$EFace_Anger|Could it be...?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|It is, Prince Alfonse! The legend is
true. I raised Breidablik, and then
$Nu appeared!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Our Great Hero is here...and can use
the divine weapon too!$k$pAs for what Breidablik shoots?
It's truly wonderful. It fires
Heroes right out of it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Unbelievable. So you're our Great
Hero, come to us from another
world, $Nu.$k$pI am Alfonse, Prince of Askr and
member of the Order of Heroes.
A pleasure to meet you.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I'm sorry to ask this of you so
soon after we've met, but I have
need of your help.$k$pOur order is devoted to fighting
the Emblian Empire, which invades
worlds where Heroes are from.$k$pOne of these is the World of Mystery.
I have dire news. The empire has
newly taken over that world.$k$pWe need to make our way to the
World of Mystery to free it!$k$p$EFace_Normal2|And, Commander Anna, there's one
more thing. I spotted someone odd
with the soldiers near here.$k$pA strange man. Not an imperial
soldier. Nor a Hero from the World of
Mystery now under their control.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|A strange man, you say? Did he
seem allied with the Emblian
Empire?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I don't know. I've never seen him
before. He wears a mask and keeps
his face a secret even from them.$k$p$EFace_Anger|But now, we must rush into battle.
Soldiers approach!$k$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|$w0|$SspVOICE_TUTORIAL_A|Keep the weapon triangle in mind,
$Nu.$k

Red weapons are strong against
green ones—and so on around
the weapon triangle.

$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Who are you, stranger? Alfonse, this
must be the masked man you saw!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|You! Tell us—are you a soldier in the
Emblian Empire? If so, then you
stand on the side of evil.$k$pThe empire shouldn't be entering
the worlds of Heroes—let alone
conquering them!$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh, really? And I suppose you want
us to close the gateways too?$k$pHmpf. In your dreams.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|How dare you! Where are you
going? Get back here and answer
for yourself!$k$pDamn fellow. He's gone.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Those gateways he mentioned,
$Nu...$k$pThey connect our world to all
those where Heroes live.$k$pThe royalty of the Askran Kingdom,
like Alfonse, have the ability to
open these gateways.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|And the royalty of the Emblian
Empire are able to close the
gateways.$k$pLong ago, our two families worked
in harmony to open and close
these ways to other worlds.$k$p$EFace_Cool|But then Embla began using its
power for evil, leaving all of the
gates open.$k$pThe empire began invading those
worlds. We cannot slam the gates
shut. Only they can.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|We can fight them, however. That's
why we Askrans formed the Order of
Heroes—to stop the Emblians.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Now, let's hurry to the World of
Mystery.$k$pAlfonse...your sister has been on
a scouting mission. I fear that
she may be in danger.$k$Sbs150|
